title: S12 Ep114: Supernatural News/Parashare: Episode 180
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Episode 180
description: BEYOND the DARKNESS is back to report Supernatural News from around the world and share YOUR Paranormal phone calls and emails! plus, while Dave is away this week, Tim has recruited the one and only, Tim Weisberg to fill in! It's a strange week of stories with a Michigan woman claiming that Bigfoot loves blueberry bagels, A conspiracy theorist wins a $20,000 workplace discrimination payout, and a gray man ghost makes himself known before Hurricane Florence! PLUS we answer your calls and emails in our ParaShare segment.
